newsitem.title: USA: HFS, PHH approve merger deal.
newsitem.headline: HFS, PHH approve merger deal.

text.p: Shareholders of HFS Inc and PHH Corp approved Wednesday a merger deal between the two companies at their annual meetings, the companies said.
HFS, a real estate and travel services company, said it issued approximately 30.9 million shares, including shares issued to holders of PHH's employee stock options, at the closing of the merger.

Under a merger agreement, PHH shareholders received 0.825 shares of HFS for each PHH share held. HFS said it will release its first quarter results on May 1, including the PHH acqusition, which is being treated as a pooling of interests.
In another development, HFS said its board elected three new members, raising the number of directors to 15.
